Package com.github.anastaciocintra.escpos

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EscPosConst  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EscPos
    Write some usual ESC/POS commands to the OutPutStream.
    PrintModeStyle
    Supply ESC/POS text style with the set of Print Mode commands NOTE: You can use this class when your printer isn't compatible with Style class, otherwise, always prefer to use Style class, this is because PrintModeStyle have less features than Style class.
    Style
    Supply ESC/POS text style commands Note: If your printer isn't compatible with this class, you can try to use PrintModeStyle class
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    EscPos.CharacterCodeTable
    values of character code table.
    EscPos.CutMode
    Values for CutMode.
    EscPos.PinConnector
    Values for pin connector
    EscPosConst.Justification
    Values for print justification.
    PrintModeStyle.FontName
    Values of font name.
    Style.ColorMode
    values of color mode background / foreground reverse.
    Style.FontName
    Values of font name.
    Style.FontSize
    Values of font size.
    Style.Underline
    values of underline style.
